description: Finite State Machine for an interactive queue application that allows users to enqueue and dequeue items.
notes: The application starts in the 'idle' state. Clicking the enqueue button transitions to 'enqueueing', where an item is added to the queue. After the item is added, it transitions back to 'idle'. Clicking the dequeue button transitions to 'dequeueing', where the first item is removed from the queue. After the item is removed, it transitions back to 'idle'.
